sentence.Network_en: My underskirt had ridden up into a thick band around my hips.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的衬裙已经蹿到臀部，厚厚地卷成一圈。

sentence.Network_en: The gunman escaped on a motorcycle being ridden by an accomplice.
sentence.Network_cn: 持枪歹徒坐上一辆由同伙驾驶的摩托车逃逸。

sentence.Network_en: Too many women are like me, guilt ridden about the kids.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多女人都像我一样，对孩子充满了内疚。

means.word_mean: 1. tormented or harassed by nightmares or unreasonable fears;

sentences.sentence: "hagridden...by visions of an imminent heaven or hell upon earth"- C.S.Lewis
